title: Warriors In Finals, How To Build Around Luka
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN's Tim MacMahon and Tim Bontemps to discuss the Warriors advancing to their 6th NBA Finals in 8 years, Klay Thompson’s joy in the win, what is next for the Mavs, if the league will trend away from ‘Super Teams’ going forward, how the Suns will manage Ayton in the offseason and the ability of Boston to shut down any half-court offense from the Heat.

itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Warriors Advance To The Finals, How Can The Mavs Properly Build Around Luka?
